products.name: Fairy Sparklers
products.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

products.name: Smoke Ball
products.description: Fun for any age as they release a color cloud into the air.

products.name: Firecracker
products.description: Small explosive device primarily designed to produce a large amount of noise, especially in the form of a loud bang.

products.name: Roman Candle
products.description: Traditional type of firework that ejects one or more stars or exploding shells.

products.name: Multiple Rocket Launcher
products.description: A box that launches many rockets in the air.

products.name: Fountain
products.description: Emits showers of red, green, yellow and blue star with silvery and golden chrysanthemum, crackles and silvery glitter

products.name: Spider
products.description: This appears in the sky as a series of radial lines much like the legs of a spider.

products.name: Kamuro
products.description: A dense burst of glittering silver or gold stars which leave a heavy glitter trail and are very shiny in the night's sky.

products.name: Palmshell
products.description: A shell containing a relatively few large comet stars arranged in such a way as to burst with large arms or tendrils, producing a palm tree-like effect.

products.name: Lead Azide
products.description: Lead azide is highly sensitive and usually handled and stored under water in insulated rubber containers. It will explode after a fall of around 150 mm (6 in) or in the presence of a static discharge of 7 millijoules

products.name: Mercury Fulminate
products.description: It is highly sensitive to friction and shock and is mainly used as a trigger for other explosives in percussion caps and blasting caps..

products.name: DDNP
products.description: Although Griess had mentioned in 1859 that diazodinitrophenol exploded upon heating,

products.name: Black Powder
products.description: Gunpowder is classified as a low explosive because of its relatively slow decomposition rate and consequently low brisance.

products.name: Smokeless Powder
products.description: The basis of the term smokeless is that the combustion products are mainly gaseous, compared to around 55% solid products (mostly potassium carbonate, potassium sulfate, and potassium sulfide) for black powder..

products.name: Flash Powder
products.description: Flash powder is a pyrotechnic composition, a mixture of oxidizer and metallic fuel, which burns quickly and if confined produces a loud report.

products.name: PETN
products.description: 1 kg of PETN has the energy of 1.24 kg TNT.

products.name: RDX
products.description: RDX, an initialism for Research Department explosive, is an explosive nitroamine widely used in military and industrial applications.

products.name: Water Gel
products.description: A water-gel explosive is a fuel sensitized explosive mixture consisting of an aqueous ammonium nitrate solution that acts as the oxidizer.
